languages.text: Орден Единственной звезды присоединился к восставшим против отступника-инквизитора. Говорят, именно рука настоятельницы Ардженты оборвала жизнь недостойного предателя, хоть подвиг сей и был для нее скорбен.

The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.
languages.original_text: Орден Единственной звезды присоединился к восставшим против отступника-инквизитора. Говорят, именно рука настоятельницы Ардженты оборвала жизнь недостойного предателя, хоть подвиг сей и был для нее скорбен.

traits.locale_text: Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of an despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of an despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

languages.text: 命运之星修会加入了反抗大审判官的叛乱之中，这场叛乱最终遭到了镇压。据说，阿洁塔教长亲手处决了其中一个叛徒的性命，这场叛乱让她非常难过。
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: 命运之星修会加入了反抗审判长的叛乱之中，这场叛乱最终遭到了镇压。据说，阿洁塔教长亲手处决了其中一个叛徒的性命，这场叛乱让她非常难过。

languages.text: 一つ星騎士団は背教者となった異端審問官に対する反乱軍に加わった。卑劣な裏切り者の命を断ったのは上級聖職者アルジェンタだと言われているが、彼女はその行いをひどく悲しんでいたという。
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: 一つ星騎士団は背教者となった異端審問官に対する反乱軍に加わった。卑劣な裏切り者の命を断ったのは上級聖職者アルジェンタだと言われているが、彼女はその行いをひどく悲しんでいたという。

languages.text: L'Ordre de l'Étoile unique rejoignit la rébellion contre l'inquisiteur coupable d'apostasie. Le bruit court que' sœur Argenta élimina de sa main le méprisable traître, mais qu'elle fut profondément attristée de devoir le faire.
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: L'Ordre de l'Étoile unique rejoignit la rébellion contre l'inquisiteur coupable d'apostasie. Le bruit court que' sœur Argenta élimina de sa main le méprisable traître, mais qu'elle fut profondément attristée de devoir le faire.

languages.text: La Orden de la Estrella Única se unió a la rebelión contra el Inquisidor apóstata. Se dice que fue la mano de la prelada Argenta la que puso fin al abominable traidor, aunque aquel acto la llenó de un gran pesar.
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: La Orden de la Estrella Única se unió a la rebelión contra el Inquisidor apóstata. Se dice que fue la mano de la prelada Argenta la que puso fin al abominable traidor, aunque aquel acto la llenó de un gran pesar.

languages.text: Der Orden vom Einen Stern schloss sich der Rebellion gegen den zum Apostaten gewordenen Inquisitor an. Es heißt, ein verachtenswerter Verräter habe durch die Hand von Prälatin Argenta den Tod gefunden, sie sei darüber aber sehr traurig gewesen.
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: Der Orden vom Einen Stern schloss sich der Rebellion gegen den zum Apostaten gewordenen Inquisitor an. Es heißt, ein verachtenswerter Verräter habe durch die Hand von Prälatin Argenta den Tod gefunden, sie sei darüber aber sehr traurig gewesen.

languages.text: Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı, dinden çıkan Engizisyoncu'ya karşı başlatılan isyana katıldı. Aşağılık hainin, Piskopos Argenta'nın elinde can verdiği ancak kendisinin bu zafere dair büyük bir hüzün beslediği söylenir.
languages.original_text: The Order of the One Star joined the rebellion against the Inquisitor turned apostate. It is said that it was the hand of Prelate Argenta that ended the life of a despicable traitor, though she was greatly saddened by the deed.

traits.locale_text: Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı, dinden çıkan Engizisyoncu'ya karşı başlatılan isyana katıldı. Aşağılık hainin yaşamının Piskopos Argenta'nın ellerinde sonlandığı ancak kendisinin bu zafere dair büyük bir hüzün beslediği söylenir.
